RelatedSentence: TUCSON ( KGUN9 -- TV ) --   More than one - thousand dog deaths may have been caused by toxic jerky treats .
The Food and Drug Administration says there have been almost 5,000 complaints since 2007 about the treats .
The FDA is still unsure about the specific cause of the illnesses and deaths , but most cases happened right after the pets had eaten chicken , duck or sweet potato treats imported from China .
